summary: A simple mod that allows you to customize Chaconne with all the options you can expect from my customizers
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/6701/ZXxBRW.png[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b][i][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Chaconne looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes.[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37869/?]Chaconne Follower[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use Â TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\Chaconne[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\[i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\Chaconne[/color][/i][/color][/i]. The eyes goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\[/color][i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\Chaconne\eyes[/color].[/i][/i][/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Chaconne Customizer - CBBE - 1.2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to the new and better version of the framework for the installer
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Removed a lot of eye options. This was because I always felt that there were to many to choose from.
Removed SeveNBase. You can easily install this yourself

files.name: Chaconne Customizer - UNP - 1.2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to the new and better version of the framework for the installer
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Removed a lot of eye options. This was because I always felt that there were to many to choose from.
Removed SeveNBase. You can easily install this yourself
